raw.ec_description: This readily biodegradable ethylene oxide / propylene oxide reverse block copolymer delivers low foam, excellent solvency, chemical stability and reliable formulation performance in a variety of processes such as cleaning, paper processing, water treatment, and metal working fluids. It is readily miscible in water and can be used in combination with other surfactants in a wide range of aqueous formulations.

raw.title: EcoSense™ GL-60 HL Surfactant
raw.dow_desc: A naturally derived ( &gt;99% bio derived) bio-surfactant with emulsifying properties. This is a glycolipid, more specifically a sophorolipid with low HLB and foaming. It contains a high lactone form percentage. Thanks to its high active content, it is used at low levels to boost the performance of other bio-based surfactants allowing naturally derived formulations. EcoSense™ GL-60 HL Surfactant is non-GMO, sugar based and exhibits &gt; 60 percent biodegradation within 28 days per OECD 301F. INCI name: Glycolipids

raw.dow_desc: A plant-based, readily biodegradable nonionic surfactant that produces moderate to high stable foam for use in applications such as liquid laundry detergents, hand dishwash liquids, floor cleaners, multipurpose cleaners, etc. This product is chemically stable in the presence of acids, bases and salts and compatible with anionic, cationic, and other nonionic surfactants. ECOSENSE™ 919 is comprised of 50% formulation water, and the remaining 50% solid content is considered derived natural with a Natural Origin Index of 1 under ISO 16128.&nbsp;

raw.title: DOWSIL™ PV-9001 Backsheet Coating
raw.dow_desc: A low modulus silicone coating designed for monofacial solar modules as a backsheet repair coating to increase module reliability. This is a flowable coating that has a non-corrosive cure with durable adhesion to a variety of backsheet substrates.
dow_prd_uses: Sealing and coating photovoltaic modules where low viscosity and self-leveling properties in combination with non-corrosive cure is required.&lt
Designed for applications which demand a strong but flexible bond such as a backsheet coating with differing thermal expansion rates.&amp
Product can be sprayed onto mounted panels or spread in liquid form in dismounted panels.&amp

raw.dow_desc: A plant-based, readily biodegradable nonionic surfactant that produces moderate to high stable foam for use in applications such as liquid laundry detergents, hand dishwash liquids, floor cleaners, multipurpose cleaners, etc. This product is chemically stable in the presence of acids, bases and salts and compatible with anionic, cationic, and other nonionic surfactants.&nbsp;ECOSENSE™ 1000 is comprised of 50% formulation water, and the remaining 50% solid content is considered derived natural with a Natural Origin Index of 1 under ISO 16128.&nbsp;

raw.title: FOAMYSENSE™ 205 Polymer
raw.dow_desc: A water soluble additive designed to enhance the density and fullness of the foam in shampoos, body washes and liquid soaps. It does synergistically enhance conditioning of dry and wet hair and skin in formulations containing cationic conditioning polymers.&nbsp;INCI Name: PEG-14M

raw.dow_desc: Self film forming styrene acrylic pre-composite polymer that can be used in a variety of coatings. Paints containing this product can be formulated with less TiO2 and maintain very good hiding which leads to formulation cost savings and possibly an improved sustainability profile. Additionally, the adsorption of this polymer on the pigment results in a more homogeneous paint film with improved resistance to stains, tannin blocking, corrosion and efflorescence.

raw.title: RHOBARR™ 620 Barrier Dispersion
raw.dow_desc: Aqueous acid-modified dispersion intended for heatsealable barrier coating applications on paper and board. RHOBARR™ 620 Barrier Dispersion has been designed for use in formulations targeted for heat sealable paper and board barrier coating applications. This base dispersion can be formulated with rheology modifiers, waxes and other components as required, forming a resistant and heatsealable coating on proper application and thermal curing.
dow_prd_uses: Recyclable, heatsealable barrier coating for fiber-based food packaging&lt
Barrier against liquid water (COB) and moisture vapor (MVTR)&lt
Suitable for cupstock, folding boxboard, flexible paper and rigid fiber based packaging coatings.&lt

raw.title: SURLYN™ PC-2000 Ionomer
raw.dow_desc: The material of choice for premium cosmetic packaging, such as perfume caps and cream jars, thanks to its renowned crystal-like transparency, its superior scratch and chemical resistance. Its unique properties offer endless packaging possibilities: be inspired by nature, surprising shapes, floating objects suspended in time and space. Turn your most incredible dreams into real packaging applications. SURLYN™ PC‐2000 will help you to move the limits of your creativity and to open new opportunities. SURLYN™ PC‐2000 is an ionomer of ethylene acid copolymer. The resin can be processed via injection molding.

raw.title: DOWSIL™ 2014 Adhesive
raw.dow_desc: A solventless silicone pressure sensitive adhesive that, when used with SYL-OFF™ 4000 Catalyst, offers the ability to prepare pressure sensitive constructions at low curing temperatures. It also yields a stable release system when applied and cured on release liners coated with SYL-OFF™ Q2-7785 Coating and SYL-OFF™ 7795 Coating. It can be blended with other DOWSIL™ solvent free platinum catalyzed PSAs like DOWSIL™ 7626 Adhesive, DOWSIL™ 7636 Adhesive, DOWSIL™ 7646 Adhesive and DOWSIL™ 7666 Adhesive to adjust peel adhesion.

raw.title: EcoSense™ HC-2200 Surfactant
raw.dow_desc: A naturally derived bio-surfactant with good detergency, wetting and emulsifying properties. EcoSense™ HC-2200 Surfactant is a glycolipid,&nbsp;more specifically a sophorolipid with a high lactone percentage, low HLB and low foaming. Its high active content and high efficacy support&nbsp;low use levels and reduction in total surfactant used lowering the carbon footprint of formulations by increasing naturality, reducing actives and&nbsp;thereby helping to enable compaction. EcoSense™ HC-2200 Surfactant is non-GMO.and readily bio-degradable (60 %&nbsp; biodegradation within&nbsp;28 days per OECD 301F).

raw.ec_description: A naturally derived bio-surfactant with good detergency, wetting and emulsifying properties. EcoSense™ HC-2200 Surfactant is a glycolipid,&nbsp;more specifically a sophorolipid with a high lactone percentage, low HLB and low foaming. Its high active content and high efficacy support&nbsp;low use levels and reduction in total surfactant used lowering the carbon footprint of formulations by increasing naturality, reducing actives and&nbsp;thereby helping to enable compaction. EcoSense™ HC-2200 Surfactant is non-GMO.and readily bio-degradable (60 %&nbsp; biodegradation within&nbsp;28 days per OECD 301F).

raw.title: EcoSense™ HC-2100 Surfactant
raw.dow_desc: A naturally derived bio-surfactant with good wetting and emulsifying properties. EcoSense™ HC-2100 Surfactant is a glycolipid, more&nbsp;specifically a sophorolipid with a high acid percentage, medium to high HLB and good solubility. Its high active content and high efficacy&nbsp;support low use levels and reduction in total surfactant used lowering the carbon footprint of formulations by increasing naturality,&nbsp;reducing actives and thereby helping to enable compaction. EcoSense™ HC-2100 Surfactant is non-GMO.and readily bio-degradable&nbsp;(60 % biodegradation within 28 days per OECD 301F).

raw.dow_desc: A nature-derived, high performance surfactant. EcoSense™ APP-1000 Surfactant is a non-ionic alkyl polyglycosides surfactant. This surfactant is 100 % naturally derived, produced by green chemistry principles. It can be used at low levels to boost the performance of other bio-based surfactants enabling naturally derived formulations.

It can be used at low levels to boost the performance of other bio-based surfactants enabling naturally derived formulations.

raw.dow_desc: A multifunctional water-soluble polymer that enhance foams, form films, thicken, and stabilize. It is a cold water dispersible hydroxymethylcellulose product with a viscosity of 75,000 mPas for a 2% aqueous solution at 20° C. Applications for this product include body washes and facial cleansers, shampoos, liquid hand soaps, shaving creams and foams, hair styling mousses and sulfate-free cleansing products. INCI Name: Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose

raw.ec_description: A multifunctional water-soluble polymer that enhance foams, form films, thicken, and stabilize. It is a cold water dispersible hydroxymethylcellulose product with a viscosity of 75,000 mPas for a 2% aqueous solution at 20° C. Applications for this product include body washes and facial cleansers, shampoos, liquid hand soaps, shaving creams and foams, hair styling mousses and sulfate-free cleansing products. INCI Name: Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose

Title: CELLOSIZE™ Texture 40-0101 Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose

raw.dow_desc: A multifunctional, nonionic, water soluble polymer that enhances and stabilizes foams, forms films, and thickens formulations. Interfacial thermal gelation occurs spontaneously in even dilute systems over a wide range of use temperatures.

raw.dow_desc: A plant-based, readily biodegradable nonionic surfactant that produces moderate to high stable foam for use in applications such as liquid laundry detergents, hand dishwash liquids, floor cleaners, multipurpose cleaners, etc. This product is chemically stable in the presence of acids, bases and salts and compatible with anionic, cationic, and other nonionic surfactants.&nbsp;ECOSENSE™ 3000 Surfactant is comprised of 65% formulation water, and the remaining 35%&nbsp;solid content is considered derived natural with a Natural Origin Index of 1 under ISO 16128.&nbsp;

raw.ec_description: A plant-based, readily biodegradable nonionic surfactant that produces moderate to high stable foam for use in applications such as liquid laundry detergents, hand dishwash liquids, floor cleaners, multipurpose cleaners, etc. This product is chemically stable in the presence of acids, bases and salts and compatible with anionic, cationic, and other nonionic surfactants.&nbsp;ECOSENSE™ 3000 Surfactant is comprised of 65% formulation water, and the remaining 35%&nbsp;solid content is considered derived natural with a Natural Origin Index of 1 under ISO 16128.&nbsp;

raw.title: Pyrolysis Gasoline
raw.dow_desc: Pygas (CAS: 68477-58-7) is rich in Benzene, Toluene and Xylene (BTX). Benzene is a valuable molecule because it used to produce a number of important chemical intermediates for industrial use. Pygas is produced by Dow’s hydrocarbon crackers and is a mixture of hydrocarbon materials of various molecular weights. It has high aromatics content and can be distilled to separate out various BTX fractions for use in other manufacturing processes.&nbsp;
dow_prd_uses: A valuable cracker by-product used for BTX (benzene, toluene and xylene) production and subsequent conversion to useful industrial products&lt

raw.dow_prd_benefits_html: <ul>  <li>Mild&nbsp;</li>  <li>Soluble in alkaline solutions&nbsp;</li>  <li>Produces moderate to high stable foam</li>  <li>Low filming / streaking&nbsp;</li>  <li>Good detergency &amp; wetting properties&nbsp;</li>  <li>Readily biodegradable &nbsp;</li>  <li>100% vegetable origin</li>  <li>Solvent-free</li>  <li>Self-preserved</li>  <li>Low eco-toxicity and toxicity</li>  <li>Compatible with broad range of surfactants and polymers, including cationic ingredients</li> <li>To the best of our knowledge this product does not contain ingredients of animal origin.</li><li>To the best of our knowledge this product complies with California Prop 65*</li></ul><p>*See Regulatory Datasheet for further details</p>

raw.dow_desc: A vegetable-based, readily biodegradable surfactant provides sensory benefits to shampoos, facial washes, body washes/shower gels and hand soap formulations. Offers broad compatibility with other common Personal Care ingredients and is preservative free. Has an excellent environmental profile and offers formulators a surfactant solution with low ecotoxicity and toxicity.&nbsp;

raw.ec_description: A vegetable-based, readily biodegradable surfactant provides sensory benefits to shampoos, facial washes, body washes/shower gels and hand soap formulations. Offers broad compatibility with other common Personal Care ingredients and is preservative free. Has an excellent environmental profile and offers formulators a surfactant solution with low ecotoxicity and toxicity.&nbsp;
